text: James Warhola (born March 16, 1955) is an American artist. He has illustrated dozens of children's picture books since 1987. Warhola was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He is the son of Paul Warhola, Andy Warhol's oldest brother. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American cartoonists Category:American artists Category:People from Pittsburgh
title: James Warhola
